description: Niko & Georgia Bergadosbeing in the restaurant business for over 25 years and having Greek restaurants in Florida & Ohio decided to go on the road. they specialize in authentic Greek cuisine. "Real Greek Street Eats" on the go! They cook the Gyro on a rotisserie and besides serving the Gyro that people in the US know they are serving the Greek Gyro which is Gyro with tomatoes, onions Tzaziki sauce and French fries in a Pita. Also on the menu is marinated Pork Souvlakia, served on a stick or in a Pita. Niko makes his traditional homemade Tzaziki & Hummus. AND THER'S MORE......they also serve the O-H-I-O Donut Burger. A fresh hand patty Cheeseburger with bacon between two Glazed Donuts. Try the Fried Beef Bologna sandwich with grilled onions on Texas toast.Get in touch with Niko's Street Eats...They'll get on the go and come to you!
name: Niko's Street Eats on the Go
